title: Club I created has vanished [CLIENT]
body:
Please help! I have an issue with my Club not appearing on my account, here is a link to my ticket.
Can anybody help me or contact support? Thank you!

replies.body: We're happy to help when we can on the boards, but it's not a means to bypass the ticketing system.  I looked into your ticket and see that a specialist has already replied and awaiting a response.  Reply back as soon you can to get it fixed up!
